title: A very spacious, huge duplex apartment + 700sqft private yard.
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


It can be a daunting task searching for affordable apartments in South Slope. However we have a pretty sweet deal with this apartment! A very spacious, huge duplex apartment + 700sqft private yard for no fee. This apartment is situated in the heart of South Slope/Park Slope Border, 1 short block away from the Prospect Ave R line as well as the 9 Street F/G lines. Countless convenience stores and restaurants surround the area as well as nice new cafes and bars to indulge yourself in.

AMENITIES
• Central A/C
• High Ceilings
• Hardwood Floors
• Eat In Kitchen
• Stainless Steel Appliances
• Stone countertops
• Granite countertops
• Outdoor Space
• Roof access
• Laundry in building
• Duplex

If you are interested in a showing please text Kirby at 929-243-4946 !!
Mention listing ID:37316!!
Must meet income and credit requirement.
